flawed_nl_solution:
Kyle has 46*3-12 = <<46*3-12=162>>162 dollars.
Kyle spends 162/3 = <<162/3=54.0>>54.0 dollars going snowboarding.
Kyle has 162-54.0 = <<162-54.0=108.0>>108.0 dollars left.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 126, not 162. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
